Footer.description: Pioneers in the most secure real estate tokenization model on Web 3

privacy: By providing your contact information, which is considered personal data, you acknowledge and consent to our commitment to handle this data for the purposes of promotion or advertising, either for our own use or for third parties that may be of interest. This applies to our platform or website, and may include offering commercial promotions related to goods or services or any other information. By accepting these terms, you grant your consent.

Nuestro aviso de privacidad FINGANAS S.A.P.I DE CV SOFOM ENR denominado por el (responsable) será encargado de llevar los ciertos datos personales que serán proporcionados a través de usted denominado el (Titular), para efectos del presente aviso señala. Datos Personales que están sometidos a resguardo. Los datos proporcionados por parte del el Titular y revisión de los mismos en el sitio web son: Datos de identificación (Nombre (s), Apellido (s), Correo Electrónico y Número Telefónico, RFC). El Titular no deberá añadir, otorgar otros datos no requeridos o diferentes a los ya solicitados por el responsable.

FINGANAS S.A.P.I DE CV SOFOM ENR ensures that personal data will be protected and handled confidentially and securely. At no point will sensitive or intimate personal data be requested, and we condemn any improper use that could lead to discrimination based on racial or ethnic origin, religious beliefs, sexual preference, or other factors.

When visiting our website or related sites, applications, and services, FINGANAS S.A.P.I DE CV SOFOM ENR may collect information sent from your access device, whether it’s a computer, mobile phone, or other devices, including: data on the pages accessed, IP address and/or device identifiers, operating system in use, location, mobile network information, standard web registration data, browser being used, and traffic to and from our site.

Additionally, FINGANAS S.A.P.I DE CV SOFOM ENR may collect information regarding your interactions with our website in relation to the services provided. In case of a request, this information may be made available to competent authorities in Mexico or those with jurisdiction under international treaties to which Mexico is a party.

Furthermore, by accessing our website or using our services, FINGANAS S.A.P.I DE CV SOFOM ENR may place encoded data files (cookies, pixel tags, "Flash cookies," or other local storage means provided by your browser or associated applications, collectively referred to as "cookies"). The purpose of using these technologies is to recognize and personalize your experience as a user of our services, making your account more secure and more efficient. You can choose to block, delete, or disable cookies directly through your browser settings.

In accordance with the law, FITAL MX has simple and effective procedures for addressing requests related to Access, Rectification, Cancellation, and Opposition ("ARCO Rights"). These requests can be made through a form that can be obtained upon prior request via email. For any questions or to exercise your ARCO rights, please contact us at: contacto@fitalmx.com. If requested, we will provide you with the procedure to follow.
All rights reserved, FINGANAS S.A.P.I DE CV SOFOM ENR.
terms: By accessing and using our website, you accept and grant the appropriate permissions for the use and access to the site. FINGANAS S.A.P.I DE CV SOFOM ENR informs you that you explicitly agree to this authorization so that the information collected when entering our portal is handled with great care. The protection of your data is crucial, ensuring that it is not compromised. We will manage your data properly, providing security and protection to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected, without promoting discrimination, racism, or any other malicious distinctions that could harm the integrity of those involved, upholding the unique and inviolable rights of each individual.

FINGANAS S.A.P.I DE CV SOFOM ENR reserves the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time by posting a revised version on the SITES. The revised version will take effect upon its publication. Additionally, if the revised version includes a significant change, we will notify you in advance by posting a notice on the SITES. After this notification period, you will be considered to have expressly accepted all modifications to this policy.

In the event of a security breach at any stage of personal data processing, FINGANAS S.A.P.I DE CV SOFOM ENR. will notify the public immediately on our website or through personal notification so that the individuals affected by the breach can take the appropriate measures to protect their rights.

This notice complies with the guidelines issued by the Federal Institute for Access to Information and Data Protection (IFAI) as well as the provisions of the Federal Law on the Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties.
All rights reserved, FINGANAS S.A.P.I DE CV SOFOM ENR.

Home.description: FITAL is revolutionizing the real estate market through tokenization, transforming physical properties into real estate tokens (virtual assets) to simplify their commercialization. Additionally, it offers digital trust services, ensuring assets are protected, and with our wallet, we connect you to the future of the digital economy.

video.description: and take the first step into the digital real estate revolution.

title: How to
tokenize
your property
with FITAL?
tokenize.description: Start by transferring the property to a trust, turning physical properties into virtual assets that can be easily bought, sold, and managed. This simplifies access to the real estate market, enhances liquidity, and reduces the costs associated with traditional real estate transactions.

advantages.title: Advantages over traditional property sales.
cards: Buyers can acquire fractions of multiple properties instead of concentrating all their capital on a single property, reducing risk.
By using blockchain and trusts, many traditional intermediaries are eliminated, significantly reducing transaction costs.
Tokens (virtual assets) can be easily transferred between buyers and sellers without lengthy and complicated procedures.

title: FITAL
offers
offers: Help attract buyers from all segments
Protection and security through digital trusts

header.title: Tokenize Your Properties:
header.description: The Future of Real Estate with FITAL

form.title: Are you interested in protecting your assets?
form.description: Enter your details, and we will contact you.
form.name: Name

description.title: What is it?
description.description: It’s the process of transforming physical properties into real estate tokens (virtual assets). This allows properties to be divided into smaller fractions, making entry into the real estate market easier and less complicated. Along with the digital trust that holds the properties, hosting them in a blockchain-enabled wallet ensures transparency and security in all transactions.

liquidity.title: Liquidez:
liquidity.description: Tokenization allows physical properties to be divided into tokens (virtual assets) that can be easily bought and sold in secondary markets, enhancing liquidity and making it easier to convert profits into cash.

security.title: Blockchain Security:
security.description: Blockchain technology protects ownership data and transactions through encryption, preventing tampering and ensuring the integrity and security of investments.

transparency.title: Transparency:
transparency.description: All transactions and property records are stored on a blockchain, creating a clear and immutable history that reduces the risk of fraud and errors.

title: Estándar ERC-3643:
Potenciando la
Tokenización de
Activos
del Mundo Real (RWA)
list: Provides a flexible and secure framework for digitally representing properties and other physical assets.
Enables their transfer and management in a decentralized environment.
ERC-3643 ensures legal compliance and enhances interoperability across different platforms.

security.title: Security:
security.description: Strengthens trust in transactions with tokenized assets.

flexibility.title: Flexibility:
flexibility.description: Adaptable to various types of physical assets.

services2.title: Looking to tokenize your project?
services2.description: Discover our platform tailored just for you.

partOf.title: Do you want to be part of FITAL?

description.title: What is it?
description.description: A digital trust is a legal tool that uses blockchain technology to securely and transparently manage and protect assets, such as money or properties. Everything is managed on digital platforms, making it faster, more accessible, and reliable.

creation.title: Creation Process
creation.traditional: Traditional: Requires paperwork and in-person legal procedures.
creation.digital: Digital: Managed online quickly and easily.

management.title: Asset Management
management.digital: Digital: Automated and more efficient, using smart contracts.

transparency.title: Transparency and Security
transparency.traditional: Traditional: Relies on reports, and information is not accessible in real time.
transparency.digital: Digital: Transparent and secure thanks to blockchain, with real-time access.

flexibilty.title: Flexibility
flexibilty.traditional: Traditional: Complicated changes requiring new procedures.
flexibilty.digital: Digital: More flexible, with instant modifications.

cost.title: Costs
cost.traditional: Traditional: More expensive due to intermediaries and procedures.
